bug.author: wangzhao765
bug.summary: Two metrics have the same help value
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Version</denchmark-h>
In master branch now. <denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cortexproject/cortex/blob/master/pkg/compactor/compactor.go>https://github.com/cortexproject/cortex/blob/master/pkg/compactor/compactor.go</denchmark-link>
In line 236 and 240, these 2 metrics have the same help value. It seems that cortex_compactor_blocks_marked_for_deletion_total means the total number of blocks marked for deletion, and cortex_compactor_garbage_collected_blocks_total means the total number of blocks deleted after being marked? <denchmark-h:h3>Configuration</denchmark-h>
(paste relevant cortex.yaml or cluster.yaml configuration) <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wangzhao765>@wangzhao765</denchmark-link> I believe you intended to file this issue at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cortexproject/cortex/issues>https://github.com/cortexproject/cortex/issues</denchmark-link> , so I'll go ahead and close this issue here
